education.school: Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education

work.title: Front end Engineer
work.description: Front end leader for KAAX fintech project. KAAX is a currency exchange in real time without intermediaries platform. Landing page development using: NextJs, Redux, GraphQL and Strapi CMS.  Webapp development using ReactJS, Redux, Typescript, Sass and Websockets.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Front end Development for Bib & Tucker Application. Bib & Tucker is a web-based uniform provider and management tools for the hospitality industry in New York. Used technologies: Django framework, Javascript.

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone

projects.category: TikTok Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
